name: todo-sort
description: A plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md) that sorts todos by completion status.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json ./dist && cp manifest.json ./dist
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Ryan Gomba
